1.title: New School Defenders
1.plot: After Voltron's victory over Lotor and his army, the Robot Lions lost control during a celebratory event and nearly destroyed a city. Because of this, Galaxy Alliance commander Sky Marshall Wade ordered the Lions to be dismissed from their duty as defenders of the universe and disbanded the Voltron Force. Since that day only the Galaxy Alliance has been in charge of protecting the universe while Lance, Pidge, and Hunk are acting officers in the army, Princess Allura is ruling her home planet Arus, and Keith is a fugitive from the Alliance. Daniel is a mischievous and ...

2.title: Defenders of Arus
2.plot: Daniel and Vince arrive at the Castle of Lions and meet a fellow Cadet named Larmina, who is revealed to be Princess Allura's niece and the trio are given their "Voltcoms", special gauntlets that access special abilities within them and will allow them in the future to pilot the Lions. As Pidge and Hunk go to rescue Keith from drifting into space (due to the fact that Wade's experiments on Black Lion have left it barely with any power), Kala, a Drule commander/strategist, and Maahox, a scientist, succeed in bringing Lotor back to life. They explain how long he has ...

3.title: Defenders of the Universe
3.plot: After the previous events, Wade goes insane and kidnaps the Alliance and replaces its soldiers with robots, while additionally holding Coran hostage. Meanwhile Lotor and Maahox plot to send a new Robeast to Arus to destroy Voltron as it is powered by a combination of Kala, the Drule commander that Maahox terminated and Haggarium, the substance that Kala's energy apparently stabilized and was used to resurrect Lotor. As the Lions fight the Kala Spider Robeast (with Daniel piloting the Red Lion along with Lance due to an injury he sustained), Keith and Larmina fend off ...

4.title: Coran Coran
4.plot: When Pidge shows off the new tail-weapon upgrades, the Voltron Force receives a distress call from Coran who warns them of a moon-base factory on Tarvos that will be manufacturing an invincible army for Sky Marshall Wade. But when they try to rescue him, they fall into a trap set by Wade as the real Coran is trapped inside and must search for him while battling Wade's own experimental versions of the Lions. Meanwhile, the cadets soon learn it's a Coran imposter that's actually a robot strapped with a time bomb and must face it in a fight.

5.title: Joyride to Doom
5.plot: When the cadets grow impatient with their lack of flight hours in the Lions, Daniel convinces the group to borrow the Lions so they can sneak off to go to Planet Doom, Lotor's home planet to grab a sample of Haggarium. But they soon find themselves abducted by Maahox, who studies Vince's strange energy signature. Meanwhile, Lotor invades the Castle of Lions and takes Allura hostage, and Voltron debuts a new reconfiguration ability during the rescue; Lance's red-center form for Voltron with "Magma Pistols".

6.title: The Hunkyard
6.plot: Hunk takes the cadets on a bonding mission to his secret junkyard called The Hunkyard to learn teamwork and to build "crush cars" so they can have their own vehicles. However, cadet bonding day comes to a halt when an army of Waderoids powered by Haggarium attack them and form together to make a massive scrap monster out of junk. When the rest of the Voltron Force arrives, they take the beast down by taking on a new form that makes Yellow Lion the body and head of Voltron and forms "Rock Wrecking Maces" as his battle weapon.

7.title: Lion Riders Return
7.plot: After receiving a distress call for help, the Voltron Force journeys to the planet Ariel in order to defend a race of lion-riding warriors from Sky Marshal Wade.

8.title: Flash Form's a Go!
8.plot: A mysterious hypersonic Robeast challenges the Voltron Force to upgrade their formation sequence.

9.title: Dark Blue
9.plot: As new cadet Vince seeks to prove his worth to the team, he finds himself trapped on a sinking shipping vessel filled with Haggarium on a planet with a bottomless ocean.

10.title: Wanted and Unwanted
10.plot: When Daniel makes a surprise appearance on Commander KeithÃ.s secret mission, Keith must attempt a prison-break from the invisible cloaked vessel known as The Void in order to save them both.

11.title: Predator Robeast
11.plot: The Voltron Force faces its toughest challenge to date and takes on LotorÃ.s five predator enemies that can combine to form one super Predator Robeast.

12.title: Hungry for Voltron
12.plot: Blue Lion pilot Princess Allura is caught in Sky Marshal WadeÃ.s blockade of the Planet Ebb and forced to fight in a combat arena.

13.title: Clash of the Lions
13.plot: The Voltron Force travels to Earth to finish the fight with Wade once and for all, but are hijacked by WadeÃ.s secret weapon which allows him to take control of Voltron!

14.title: Inside the Music
14.plot: After WadeÃ.s defeat, cadet Larmina is tasked with organizing a universe victory concert unaware that LotorÃ.s spies have infiltrated the celebration.

15.title: Rogue Trip
15.plot: The new cadets go for a pizza run on Earth and encounter a Voltron-obsessed fan with sinister intentions.

16.title: Brains
16.plot: Green Lion pilot PidgeÃ.s home planet of Balto has been taken over by Lotor, who is turning its inhabitants into mindless Ã'ninja-zombies.Ã"

17.title: Ghost in the Lion
17.plot: In an effort to save his son, former Voltron Force member Sven returns and hijacks the Blue Lion, only to be double-crossed by Lotor.

18.title: Gary
18.plot: LotorÃ.s brilliant but twisted scientist, Maahox, infiltrates the Voltron Force through a bizarre holographic pet who cadet Vince affectionately names Ã'GaryÃ".

19.title: Five Forged
19.plot: The Voltron Force returns to Planet Ariel and must survive challenges inside a series of dangerous mines, which hold clues to the secret of VoltronÃ.s origin.

20.title: Dradin, Baby, Dradin
20.plot: The Voltron Force heads to the leisure planet of Dradin for a bit of relaxation, but soon discover ex-members of LotorÃ.s army are attempting to take the planet over by force.

21.title: I, Voltron
21.plot: When cadet DanielÕs consciousness is accidentally transferred into VoltronÕs robotic body, he suddenly finds himself the living embodiment of the Defender of the Universe.

22.title: Crossed Signals
22.plot: Voltron Force receives a distress call from the past that leads them to a haunted spaceship graveyard where Lotor also awaits.

23.title: Roots of Evil
23.plot: While battling the roots of a plant-like Robeast, Allura must choose between becoming Queen of Arus, or continuing her role as Blue Lion pilot

24.title: The Army of One
24.plot: King Lotor is replicated into a powerful army of clones who attempt to take over Planet Arus and permanently destroy Voltron.

25.title: Deceive and Conquer
25.plot: Voltron Force takes on a fully powered King Lotor, all while fighting a rogue spider Robeast that is able to merge itself with its foe.

26.title: Black
26.plot: ItÃ.s the final battle for the Voltron Force as Castle Doom is transformed into the largest Robeast ever, attempting to destroy the Galaxy Alliance and create galactic chaos!

imdb.plot outline: After the defeat of King Lotor, the team responsible for this victory, the Voltron Force, was disgraced when the Voltron Lions went berserk and were taken out of commission without investigating the cause. Years later, with the team out of action, it seems Voltron is gone for good. However, the team secretly has other plans, which come in handy when new threats revive Lotor to help threaten the galaxy again. Now the team, with a new generation of cadets in training to help them, have brought Voltron back online to protect the Universe.
imdb.title: Voltron Force
plot: The further adventures of the pilots of the Voltron lions with a new generation of cadets training to help them.::Kenneth Chisholm

After the defeat of King Lotor, the team responsible for this victory, the _Voltron Force_ (qv), was disgraced when the Voltron Lions went berserk and were taken out of commission without investigating the cause. Years later, with the team out of action, it seems Voltron is gone for good. However, the team secretly has other plans, which come in handy when new threats revive Lotor to help threaten the galaxy again. Now the team, with a new generation of cadets in training to help them, have brought Voltron back online to protect the Universe.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@rogers.com)
